name: Lost Memory Demo
description:
A game I made for my final major project at school. A short intro/tutorial demo/proof of concept for a metroidvania game I made. Controls mentioned in the options and start of the game. Once again this is just something I made as part of school work, I have no intentions of adding onto this. Sorry :/.

A 2D metroidvania game with some bullet hell elements. If you like it then thanks! If you got any feedback, good or bad don't hesitate to say so! Thanks!
